Package us.teaminceptus.vortexsidebars.text

Interface TextColor

public interface TextColor
An alternative to ChatColor that allows custom hex colors

  • Method Details

    • fromHex

      static String fromHex(String hex)
      Converts a Hex Code to a Color Code.
      Parameters:
      hex - the hex code to use, should be 6 characters long with no #, not case-sensitive
      Returns:
      the color code for the hex code, returns black if the hex code provided was in an invalid format
